QueryList.Join: <%if(has(lastUpdateDateTime)){%> AND lastUpdateDateTime=:lastUpdateDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_not)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime <> :lastUpdateDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_li)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime like '%'||:lastUpdateDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_gt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>:lastUpdateDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_ge)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>=:lastUpdateDateTime_ge <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_lt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<:lastUpdateDateTime_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_le)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<=:lastUpdateDateTime_le <%}%> <%if(has(path)){%> AND path=:path <%}%> <%else if (has(path_not)){%> and A.path <> :path_not <%}%> <%else if (has(path_li)){%> and A.path like '%'||:path_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(logicStatus)){%> AND logicStatus=:logicStatus <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_not)){%> and A.logicStatus <> :logicStatus_not <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_li)){%> and A.logicStatus like '%'||:logicStatus_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_gt)){%> and A.logicStatus>:logicStatus_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_ge)){%> and A.logicStatus>=:logicStatus_ge <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_lt)){%> and A.logicStatus<:logicStatus_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_le)){%> and A.logicStatus<=:logicStatus_le <%}%> <%if(has(size)){%> AND size=:size <%}%> <%else if (has(size_not)){%> and A.size <> :size_not <%}%> <%else if (has(size_li)){%> and A.size like '%'||:size_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(size_gt)){%> and A.size>:size_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(size_ge)){%> and A.size>=:size_ge <%}%> <%if (has(size_lt)){%> and A.size<:size_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(size_le)){%> and A.size<=:size_le <%}%> <%if(has(tenantId)){%> AND tenantId=:tenantId <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_not)){%> and A.tenantId <> :tenantId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_li)){%> and A.tenantId like '%'||:tenantId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(tenantId_gt)){%> and A.tenantId>:tenantId_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_ge)){%> and A.tenantId>=:tenantId_ge <%}%> <%if (has(tenantId_lt)){%> and A.tenantId<:tenantId_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_le)){%> and A.tenantId<=:tenantId_le <%}%> <%if(has(name)){%> AND name=:name <%}%> <%else if (has(name_not)){%> and A.name <> :name_not <%}%> <%else if (has(name_li)){%> and A.name like '%'||:name_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(id_gt)){%> and A.id>:id_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(id_ge)){%> and A.id>=:id_ge <%}%> <%if (has(id_lt)){%> and A.id<:id_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(id_le)){%> and A.id<=:id_le <%}%> <%if(has(createDateTime)){%> AND createDateTime=:createDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_not)){%> and A.createDateTime <> :createDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_li)){%> and A.createDateTime like '%'||:createDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(createDateTime_gt)){%> and A.createDateTime>:createDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_ge)){%> and A.createDateTime>=:createDateTime_ge <%}%> <%if (has(createDateTime_lt)){%> and A.createDateTime<:createDateTime_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_le)){%> and A.createDateTime<=:createDateTime_le <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
